sentences.en: All other inventions and discoveries were inconsiderable or at least subordinate.
sentences.cn: 所有其它的发明和发现都显得微不足道,或至少退居次要地位.

sentences.en: But that little ordinary inconsiderable moment of the whole process of the pursuit.
sentences.cn: 而是伴随整个追求幸福的过程中的平凡不屑的稀疏时刻.

sentences.en: Don't listen to his idea that is inconsiderable!
sentences.cn: 不要听他那考虑不周全(详)的主意!

sentences.en: Exporting may involve a not inconsiderable investment of resources.
sentences.cn: 出口牵涉到的资源投资是很庞大的.

sentences.en: He has built up a not inconsiderable business empire.
sentences.cn: 他已建立起一个有相当规模的商业帝国。

sentences.en: He was a man of great charm and not inconsiderable wit.
sentences.cn: 他是魅力十足、机智过人的男人。

sentences.en: Her not inconsiderable talent is dwarfed by his.
sentences.cn: 她的不可忽视的才华,比起他来,就是小巫见大巫.

sentences.en: It is surely out of place to write in the grand style of inconsiderable things.
sentences.cn: 如果内容微不足道,而文体十分庄重,那肯定是不适宜的.

sentences.en: Of course shooting the film in Rome was an added feature of not inconsiderable weight.
sentences.cn: 当然了,拍摄外景地选在罗马并非无足轻重,而是又一吸引人之处.

sentences.en: The implants are available as augments and press fIt'sockets, but come with not inconsiderable expense.
sentences.cn: 该内植物具有增强和压配窝, 但是价钱并不是特别贵.

sentences.en: The production costs are a not inconsiderable £8 million.
sentences.cn: 生产成本相当大，达800万英镑。

sentences.en: We have spent a not inconsiderable amount of money on the project already.
sentences.cn: 我们已经在这个项目上投入了相当大的一笔资金.

sentences.en: Yes, indeed, and received no inconsiderable pleasure from the sight.
sentences.cn: 见过, 不错, 而且看得非常高兴.

words.tran_cn: 不替别人考虑地；考虑不周地；轻率地
不顾及他人；考虑不周；粗心
不足取的；不值得考虑的；琐屑的

trans.tran_cn: 微小的，价值低的，不值得考虑的，无足轻重的
